name: Death's Dice
description:
DEATH'S DICE

You are death's disciple and have to kill as many people as you can during one night. But you can't just kill anyone... Death will roll his dice which tell you who to kill.

Find the right target and kill them. Killing other people at the same time will give additional points.

CONTROLS

Movement - Mouse Cursor

Attack - Mouse Button

Credits

Made by FIRECHICK

Linda Treffler - Art

Julian Treffler - Programming

Created for GMTKJ2022 - "Roll of the dice"
